mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.board_id, c.member_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at, m.name AS member_name, m.nickname AS nickname, CASE WHEN c.parent_comment_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS depth FROM board_comment_tb c LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.parent_comment_id IS NULL THEN c.comment_id ELSE c.parent_comment_id END, c.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comment_tb SET content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE comment_id = #{comment_id}
